description.en:
The Atari XE Game System was released in the wake of the success of Nintendo.
 
Using a platform with lots of available games and peripherals was an advantage, or so was the idea.
 
The XEGS game with a light gun and built-in Missile Command game.
 
It was not the success that was hoped for, most likely due to marketing failures and the system was discontinued at the beginning of 1991.
